'''Glutton for Goulash''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is obtained from the World Quest ''[[Ah, Fresh Meat!]]'', and requires the player to learn to make [[Goulash]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement in some languages other than English is a reference to Xiangling's Story Quest [[Mondstadt Gastronomy Trip]]: [[Cooking Showdown]], during which they eat a dish made from extinct boar, and Draff comments, "A single mouthful must be worth a hundred thousand Mora!"
